title: anyone else getting lag ingame?
body: this patch i'm getting random lag-spikes idk why. spiking up to like 1200 at any time of day.  its super annoying, help?

replies.body: Are those lag spikes only happening during certain times of the day? This might actually be happening if your ISP has a lot of traffic around that time of day tbh. Even still, let's take some precautions by going through some general network troubleshooting steps using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Go ahead and run through that [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) making sure to adjust your port forwarding and DNS settings. Let me know if that doesn't help though!
